strapiPost.title: Native Tree And Shrub Sale At Compton Gardens In Bentonville
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by the Peel Compton Foundation
strapiPost.content:
Discover ways to prepare your garden for this fall with beautiful Arkansas native plants at the Dr. Compton Native Tree & Shrub Sale this Saturday, Oct 1, from 7a to 12p. 

  • Plant native: The sale will offer 13 varieties of native plants, with perennials and shrubs ranging from $8-$25 and $35 for trees. The plant sale will take place at Compton Gardens Maintenance, located at 407 NE B St in Bentonville.
  • Learn from the experts: Don’t have a green thumb? Sign up for the T.R.E.E. program and learn how to properly plant, prune, and preserve a tree. 

Learn more about Compton Gardens HERE.
